banner_support_desc: Write to me in complete confidentiality at

form.title: Check your property's eligibility
form.desc:
Off-market marketing at Secretimmo is reserved for prestige, atypical or luxury properties.
To see if your property meets our criteria, we invite you to take an eligibility test.
Your data is treated in strict confidence and is never shared without your consent.
form.secretimmo_title: Congratulations, your property is considered exceptional and could be marketed off-market!
form.secretimmo_desc: Please fill in the evaluation request form to find out the current value of your property.
form.nextimmo_subtitle: Your property is not considered exceptional and cannot be marketed off-market!
form.nextimmo_title: The good news is that via Nextimmo, our on-market partner, you can sell it effectively.
form.nextimmo_desc: Please fill in the evaluation request form to find out the current value of your property.
form.terms_label: By checking this box, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
form.first_name_error: First name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.last_name_error: Last name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.submit_success: Your request has been sent successfully.
form.submit_error: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again.

advantages_title: The advantages of launching your prestige property sale off-market with Secretimmo

advantages.title: A smooth launch to an exclusive and targeted audience 1
advantages.content: Showcase your property to a select group of partner agencies and our pool of qualified active buyers, without immediate public exposure.
